text: While the City Sleeps is a 1956 American crime thriller movie directed by Fritz Lang and was based on the 1953 novel The Bloody Spur by Charles Einstein. It stars Dana Andrews, Rhonda Fleming, George Sanders, Howard Duff, Thomas Mitchell, Vincent Price, John Drew Barrymore and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1956 movies Category:1956 crime movies Category:1950s thriller movies Category:1950s crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Fritz Lang Category:Movies set in New York City
title: While the City Sleeps (1956 movie)
